dict.acceptation: 把…当作婴孩看待，娇养；纵容；
小孩似的；孩子的；小型的；

sent.orig: Baby we can make sweet love.
Oh baby, you're the only thing that I really need.
sent.trans: 喔，BABY,你是我唯一需要的人。

sent.orig: I can't lose you, baby see?
Baby, you should've called meWhen you were lonelyWhen you needed me to be there.
sent.trans: baby,当你孤单的时候，当你需要我的时候，你应该打电话给我。

sent.orig: You and your manipulation, you hurt my baby.
sent.trans: 你喜欢别人受你摆布，你把我的baby深深地伤害。
